name: Traditional Mirrorwork Lehnga
description: Classic green lehnga with mirrorwork detailing and a soft net dupatta, perfect for an evening mehndi function.

name: Floral Embroidered Lehnga
description: Lightweight lehnga with floral threadwork and a comfortable waistband, ideal for dancing and long ceremonies.

name: Contemporary Mehndi Lehnga
description: Modern silhouette with subtle sequin accents and a matching blouse for a clean, festive look.

name: Handcrafted Zari Lehnga
description: Rich zari and gota detailing on a flared skirt, paired with a contrast dupatta for a traditional mehndi vibe.

name: Silk Blend Lehnga
description: Silk-blend lehnga with scalloped borders and a comfortable blouse, suitable for both day and night events.

name: Embroidered Panel Lehnga
description: Panelled skirt with fine embroidery and a lightweight dupatta that drapes easily for quick styling.

name: Mint Green Mehndi Lehnga
description: Fresh mint tone with delicate handwork and tassel details that add movement for photos and dance.

name: Classic Gota Lehnga
description: Traditional gota patti borders with a flared skirt and a soft net dupatta for a festive look.

name: Heritage Weave Lehnga
description: Textured fabric with woven motifs and subtle shimmer, easy to pair with statement jewelry.

name: Pastel Mehndi Lehnga
description: Pastel lehnga with fine threadwork and a neat blouse, crafted for a soft and elegant mehndi look.

name: Festive Green Lehnga
description: Festive green lehnga with sequin highlights and a contrast dupatta for a picture-ready entry.
